articles.image_title: epa04183786 Russian President Vladimir Putin attends a meeting with members of the Council of Legislators under the Russian Federal Assembly in Petrozavodsk, Russia, 28 April 2014. The US Treasury Department is imposing sanctions on seven Russian government officials, including two members of President Vladimir Putin's inner circle, it says. They will be subject to asset freezes and US visa bans. EPA/ALEXEY DRUZHINYN /RIA NOVOSTI / KREMLIN POOL MANDATORY CREDIT +++ dpa-Bildfunk +++
